content: --आकुल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} unconfused, unperplexed, unbewildered. {2} steady, calm. {3} clear. {4} perspicuous. (--लं {1} calmness, serenity. {2} perspicuity, clearness.
निराकुल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Full of, filled or covered with; अलिकुलसंकुलकुसुमसमूहनिराकुलबकुलकलापे <ls>Gīt. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Distressed; see under निर् also.
